alert.note: Alert for Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 9:46AM CDT until May 06 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 945 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Myrtle Grove, or 11 miles south of Belle Chasse, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Port Sulphur, Pointe A La Hache and Myrtle Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
